body.name: Smart Watch, 1.91-Inch Touch Screen Smartwatch with Text Notification, Make/Answer Calls, Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen, and Activity Trackers - Compatible with iPhone and Android, for Men (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 11 mins
features: Versatile and Stylish: With over 300 different dials to choose from, this smartwatch allows you to customize your look to match any occasion, making it the perfect accessory for men who value both style and functionality.

Stay Connected on the Go: Experience the convenience of making and receiving calls directly from your wrist, ensuring that you never miss an important call even when your phone is out of reach. Stay connected and in control wherever you are.

Health and Wellness Companion: This smartwatch goes beyond a regular timepiece by offering advanced health monitoring features such as sleep tracking, heart rate monitoring, and blood oxygen monitoring. Stay proactive about your health and make informed decisions to achieve your wellness goals.

Your Personal Assistant: With its AI voice assistant, this smartwatch becomes your perfect companion throughout the day. From setting reminders, answering queries, or even controlling compatible smart home devices, this smartwatch is there to assist you, hands-free.

Elevate Your Fitness Journey: Boasting an incredible 123 exercise modes, this smartwatch empowers you to take your fitness to new heights. Whether you're a professional athlete or a fitness enthusiast, this smartwatch provides accurate tracking, analysis, and motivation, helping you achieve optimal results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recommend this wonderful watch! And it’s better and cheaper than getting any Apple Watch or any other bloody expansive watches!Do I recommend this Yes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the versa!
reviews.reviewText: In my opinion this watch is better than the Fitbit versa! Not just because the price is better but the functions it provides and the all-around quality are what make it a standout. I bought it on a flash sale because the price was amazing. It came in record time and when I opened the box I was a little concerned because there was not a book to tell me about the functions. But when I connected to the app and looked there at the functions it was very easy to figure out so a book was really not necessary. I am definitely recommending this watch to everyone that I know who wears one! Thank you for a quality product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A step up in style and function!
reviews.reviewText: This fitness tracker was slightly more $ than my previous trackers, and I was a bit skeptical. But what a step up! It's good looking, many watch face options, super functionality. The app is easy to navigate. A big plus is the ability to text customer support with questions, and get an immediate response! I'm going to really enjoy using this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lasted only a month!!!
reviews.reviewText: This watch lasted for 1 month! Also every time you try to set it to normal time it went straight to army time! Ugh! This watch has one fun game! Is NOT accurate at all for instance every day it said I was burning 3,000 calories a day which is obviously not accurate! Then over all that it died after one month of using! Not EVER buying again! 🫤

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great so far! 👌
reviews.reviewText: No issues setting this up. It connected right away to my Bluetooth. Very easy to use and connect, and also fun! There is also 24 hours a day online customer support in case of issues/questions. Great battery life also!It tracks my steps accurately and I ❤️ the look and pink color of my watch. My only drawback is that I sometimes have to reconnect to my Bluetooth in order to make and receive calls. The watch works in tandem with your phone in order to make and receive calls, so you would need to be near your phone for this feature to work. I also wish it tracked blood pressure. Other than that, I'm very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fitness tracker not accurate
reviews.reviewText: Got my wife this and, for the most part, the features work pretty well. Two main issues she has with it is it often does not notify when call/text received even though it is configured to (vibrate).The thing that irks her the most is that when using the fitness app to track a run or bike ride, it fails...a 29 mile bike ride will be recorded as 6 miles...not sure ifnphome or watch is to blame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and lots of options!
reviews.reviewText: It's comfortable, allows you to call from the watch. I can set what I want to come through like messages or notifications.Good bang for your buck. I had a issue with with my first watch it wouldn't charge. I was able to contact someone immediately through the app and she set it up to ship another immediately without trouble.
